normalised: Adaptive learning uses algorithms to tailor the learning experience to each individual student. It figures out where you're strong (like, acing your Physics numericals) and where you’re weak (maybe struggling with organic chemistry reactions, huh?). It then adjusts the difficulty and pace accordingly. Imagine a syllabus customized just for you!
